Appellation: Ballard Canyon, Central Coast, California, US
Description: Clean lines of peach custard and orange blossom are fresh on the nose of this bottling from a mountaintop site on the north end of this small appellation. A chalky minerality and brisk acidity fire up the palate, which offers nectarine and melon bubblegum flavors.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Beckmen 2021 Purisima Mountain Vineyard Viognier (Ballard Canyon)

Appellation: Santa Lucia Highlands, Central Coast, California, US
Description: This is a very racy and tight expression of Viognier, starting with aromas of lemon rind and young coconut flesh on the nose. A chalky texture frames the palate, where restrained tropical fruit flavors emerge.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Caraccioli 2021 Escolle Vineyard Viognier (Santa Lucia Highlands)

Appellation: San Diego County, South Coast, California, US
Description: A brisk style of Viognier can thrive in San Diego County, as this bottling reveals with fresh aromas of lime and white flower. A chalky texture surrounds the palate, where baked apple, pear and apricot flavors get hit with a dusting of sea salt.                      Matt Kettmann
Name: Hungry Hawk 2021 Viognier (San Diego County)Editors' Choice

Description: This extended skin-contact gem smells like the kitchen after peeling pecks of peaches. The peaches are joined by bergamot, dried apricots and pine needles. It's medium bodied, with modest acidity, velvety tannins and a chalky texture. Aged for 10 months in neutral acacia puncheons, this is ready to enjoy now through 2031.                      Michael Alberty
Name: Dionystic 2021 Peach Skin Deux Vert Vineyard Viognier (Yamhill-Carlton)Cellar Selection

Appellation: Applegate Valley, Southern Oregon, Oregon, US
Description: This is a thoroughly enjoyable medium-bodied Viognier, with a smooth, elegant texture. White peaches, toasted filberts and maple candy form an able trio on the nose, followed by flavors of cantaloupe, honeycomb and pineapple upside-down cake. It was aged in neutral French oak.                      Michael Alberty
Name: Cascadia Vineyards 2020 24K Soloro Vineyard Viognier (Applegate Valley)

Appellation: Lake County, Lake County, California, US
Description: This varietal Viognier has a pleasant elevated acidity that complements the grape's natural glossy texture. Find fresh aromas and flavors of lemon, lime, white-grapefruit zest, just-ripe green apple, white cherries, cherry blossom, chamomile and a river rock minerality.                      Stacy Briscoe
Name: Langtry 2021 Viognier (Lake County)
